summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2829, for the improvement of Hudson Street, from Rainier Avenue to 37th Avenue South; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by planking the same, under Ordinance No. 33961 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
